review.description:
We call it Ghetto Salad, but now, it has expanded into:

GHETTO INDIAN!

Before the salad days of Foragers, there was the ghetto. 5 Bucks for your choice of greens, canned veggies, and highly suspect meat products. But 5 BUCKS! 

Now, we can add even more questionable meat items, in a lovely warm and slightly spicy curry. Was that the kangaroos spinal column or did I just eat cat? How many pieces of stringy tendon does a knee contain?

But INDIAN in DUMBO - Wooo hooo!!!!!
review.author: Eric J. R.
